statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews
SELECT dish_id, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback_reviews
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT dish_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY dish_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_reviews GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND review_text LIKE '%delicious%'
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT customer_name, rating, comment FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type FROM dishes ORDER BY dish_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT dish_name, dish_description FROM dishes WHERE dish_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, dish_name, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT f.customer_name, d.dish_name, f.rating, f.comment FROM feedbacks f JOIN dishes d ON f.dish_name = d.dish_name WHERE d.cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT DISTINCT f.customer_name, COUNT(f.customer_name) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedbacks f GROUP BY f.customer_name HAVING total_feedbacks > 2;

SELECT f.customer_name, d.cuisine_type, COUNT(f.customer_name) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedbacks f JOIN dishes d ON f.dish_name = d.dish_name GROUP BY f.customer_name, d.cuisine_type HAVING total_feedbacks > 1 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC, f.customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dishes;
SELECT dish_name, country FROM Dishes WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_text FROM Reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT dish_name, ingredients[1], recipe FROM Dishes WHERE dish_name LIKE 'Spaghetti%' LIMIT 1;
SELECT * FROM Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, dish_name, rating FROM Feedback JOIN Reviews ON Feedback.feedback_id = Reviews.feedback_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT dish_name, country, ingredients[1] AS main_ingredient, recipe FROM Dishes WHERE country = 'Italy' ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, dish_name, rating FROM Feedback JOIN Reviews ON Feedback.feedback_id = Reviews.feedback_id WHERE rating < 3 AND dish_name LIKE '%Pizza%';
SELECT dish_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews, AVG(rating) FROM Reviews JOIN Dishes ON Reviews.dish_id = Dishes.dish_id GROUP BY dish_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC, AVG(rating) DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, ingredients FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT dish_name, improvement_area, suggested_changes FROM dishes LEFT JOIN quality_improvement ON dishes.dish_id = quality_improvement.dish_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type FROM dishes WHERE dish_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, review FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT improvement_area, suggested_changes FROM quality_improvement WHERE dish_id = 2 ORDER BY improvement_id;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type FROM dishes ORDER BY dish_name ASC;
SELECT cuisine_name, region FROM cuisines WHERE region='Italian';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, rating, feedback FROM customers_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type, price FROM dishes WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY dish_name;
SELECT customer_id, overall_rating FROM ratings WHERE overall_rating > 4;
SELECT dish_id, cuisine_type, price FROM dishes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT cuisine_name, region FROM cuisines JOIN regions ON cuisines.region = regions.region_id;
